description: This file defines a public function 'score_evidence' that calculates a naive score for evidence based on supporting and refuting evidence provided as lists of dictionaries.

methods.name: float score_evidence(supporting: List[Dict[str, Any]], refuting: List[Dict[str, Any]])
methods.description: Calculates a naive score for supporting and refuting evidence by summing their 'score' values and subtracting the refuting sum from supporting sum.

ctags.name: score_evidence
ctags.pattern: /^def score_evidence(supporting: List[Dict[str, Any]], refuting: List[Dict[str, Any]]) -> float:$/
